name: copy-url-on-hover-chunkyedition
description: Copy URL on Hover extension with modular architecture

scripts.build: npm run clean && rollup -c && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && rollup -c --environment BUILD:production && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp background.js popup.html popup.js options_page.html options_page.js state-manager.js dist/ && cp -r icons sidebar dist/ && sed 's/"version": "1.5.8.3"/"version": "1.5.8.4"/' manifest.json > dist/manifest.json
